reviews.review_content:
First off, Jack missed well over half the semester.  Columbia is finally cracking down on these nut jobs though.  The IEOR department informed me that they will be choosing a new professor for next year.  The TA's were awful human beings that looked as if they wanted to shoot your before they shot themselves.  
I believe no one wanted to be in that room.  The "special" presenters were also quacks filled with fluff.  These people belong in the Business School and not in Fu.
Do not take a class with Jack.  Fortunately, those who sign up for this class next year won't have to worry.
Workload:
10 pages per week
40-60 page business plan final
3 presentations
NOT WORTH IT!!
